summary: In Eschnapur, a local Maharajah and a German architect fall in-love with the same temple dancer.
cast: Debra Paget|Paul Hubschmid|Walther Reyer|Claus Holm|Sabine Bethmann|Luciana Paluzzi|René Deltgen|Valéry Inkijinoff|Jochen Brockmann|Richard Lauffen|Jochen Blume|Helmut Hildebrand
title: El tigre de Esnapur
